page.title: 02CLEE HILL SCHOOL EVENTS
page.content: The new school year begins in{ {September.} Every{December}we celebrate Christmas with a party, carol services and plays, which are performed for the villagers. In{February}there is an Open Evening for parents to come and see their children's work. In{May, June}and{July}we have many outdoor activities such as rounders, cricket, running, jumping and Maypole dancing.For Maypole dancing we have a large pole in the middle with ribbons tied on to it.We hold a ribbon and we dance round weaving a pattern round the pole. {July}is the end of the school year. Children, aged 11, transfer to a Comprehensive School which is usually Lacon Childe in Cleobury Mortimer. In{August}it is holiday time.
